.localization {paper}
    - English
        - abstract: Abstract
        - definition: Definition
        - lemma: Lemma
        - theorem: Theorem
        - proof: Proof
    - Italian
        - abstract: Sommario
        - definition: Definizione
        - lemma: Lemma
        - theorem: Teorema
        - proof: Dimostrazione

.var {INTERNALpaperblocksuffix} {\.}
.function {paperblocksuffix}
    suffix:
    .var {INTERNALpaperblocksuffix} {.suffix} 

.function {abstract}
    content:
    .center
        **.localize {paper:abstract}**

    .container padding:{3mm 1cm}
        .content

    .whitespace

.function {INTERNALcontenttype}
    type content:
    .numbered {.concatenate {.type} {s}}
        number:
        **.concatenate {
            .localize {paper:.type}
          } with:{
            .string {" .number"}
          } if:{
            .isnotempty {.number}
          }.INTERNALpaperblocksuffix** .content

.function {definition}
    content:
    .INTERNALcontenttype {definition} {.content}

.function {lemma}
    content:
    .INTERNALcontenttype {lemma} {.content}

.function {theorem}
    content:
    .INTERNALcontenttype {theorem} {.content}

.function {proof}
    content:
    .INTERNALcontenttype {proof} {.content}

    .align {end}
        .text {âˆŽ} size:{huge}
